entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow or rain. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain early this evening then 60 percent chance of light snow later this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
